name: Trash Teammates
description:
You and your friends are stuck in a trash disposal room! Work together to stack and climb your way to safety.
But watch out — dangers and hazards await!
  • STACK trash to build platforms!
  • CLIMB trash (and your teammates) to get out of harms way!
  • COOPERATE with each other, but don’t forget to save yourself!
CONTROLS:
  • A  D to Move
  • Space to Jump
  • E to Grab
  • R to Throw
FEATURING:
  • Easy-to-Learn Mechanics
  • Original Hand-drawn Art
  • Original Sound Design and Soundtrack
PLANS:
  • Character Abilities / Perks
  • Hazard Variations
  • 4-Player Online Co-op
  • Leaderboards
  • Unlockable Cosmetics
  • Player Interactions
#totem Integration:
  • When you hatch a Dinosaur in Project D.I.N.O, unlock the Dino character in Trash Teammates!
  • After clearing 5 structures in Island Ambush, unlock the Fish character in Trash Teammates!
